body: I was watching some videos on YouTube about the conspiracy theory at Denver Airport pretty strange does any on think that this would ever happen? Here is the two videos I watched. Part :   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjjIy1DO0gs Part 2 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gL2vnxVIH_0

title: Denver Airport :o

replies.body:
If there is a conspiracy then it doesn't exist anymore, it has been made public, they most likely changed to another place or something if they actually did exist



Jk bro

replies.body:
1. Why was he airport made for no reason? Actually the other airport couldn't meet traffic demands and had less runway space so yeah
2. That a pretty shit swastika and wtf do swastikas have to do with illuminati again?
3. The murals could very well be depicting past events and only the artist knows their true meaning
4. AU and AG = gold an silver. And it's on a minecart. If you didn't know that's a minecrat then....go play mc. Also the Australian antigen is not AG AU it's HBsAG look it up. 
5. There is a New World Airport commission actually. It was what founded the airport,but I guess it didn't last long. Also the Americas used to be known as the New World, which is just as valid an agrument as the ilumanti. Sorry. iloominatey 
6. Sorry. The video was to stupid and I couldn't even bring myself to watch part 2. Also FYI they legalized marijuana in Colorado so...yeah...


if you want to read this it provides some good counter arguments   http://skeptoid.com/mobile/4194
